key.name: icon-size
key.description: The size of the icons in files lists (in pixels).

key.name: search-in-path
key.summary: If the search among files should be done based on the file path.
key.description: If "true", the search among files will be done based on the file path; if "false", it will be based on the file name only.

key.name: blacklist-recent
key.description: List of strings. Possible types are: text, image, audio, video, application, multipart, message, model (these correspond to the MIME standard.)

key.name: top-padding
key.description: The number of pixels left empty at the top (for the top bar for example).

key.name: right-padding
key.description: The number of pixels left empty at the right (for a lateral dock for example).

key.name: left-padding
key.description: The number of pixels left empty at the left (for a lateral dock for example).

key.name: bottom-padding
key.description: The number of pixels left empty at the bottom (for a bottom dock for example).

key.name: position
key.summary: Where the extension should display its shit

key.name: content-left
key.description: Content of the left column. Possible values are: places, recent, desktop

key.name: searchbar-left
key.description: Position of the searchbar for the left column. Possible values are: none, top, bottom

key.name: content-right
key.description: Content of the right column. Possible values are: places, recent, desktop

key.name: searchbar-right
key.description: Position of the searchbar for the right column. Possible values are: none, top, bottom
